page.title: 20RELIGION BRAE
page.content:
CHURCH OF SCOTLAND The church of Scotland is by the biggest church in Brae and is well attended.The Rev. Gilbert Sim is the minister of a very large Parish with Brae at the centre.Most of the children in our Primary school go to the Church of Scotland Sunday school. GOSPEL HALL The new building was opened in May 1981.The men of the Gospel Hall built it themselves.The Gospel Hall is part of the Brethern.The open meeting is at 6.00p.m. every Sunday evening. BRAE BAPTIST FELLOWSHIP The Brae Baptist Fellowship meets in the Brae Secondary Staffroom on a Sunday night at 7.30p.m.The Brae Fellowship is run by Mr. N.Smith.
BRAE JUNIOR HIGH SCHOOL PRIMARY 6
